DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine impact introduce healthy , chef-enhanced food and/or environmental modification ( choice architecture ) selection consumption school food among elementary middle school student .
DOC.brief_title: The Modifying Eating Lifestyles School Study
DOC.detailed_description: Project Modifying Eating Lifestyles School ( MEALS ) school-based study develop nonprofit organization Project Bread ( www.ProjectBread.org ) Harvard School Public Health . Project Bread hire professional chef work several school low-income , urban school district Massachusetts enhance palatability nutrient profile school meal . Four school randomly assign receive professional chef . Additionally , two school district four school second school district randomly assign receive behavioral psychology intervention influence selection consumption healthy food offer . Selection consumption assess baseline , 3 month post-implementation ( short-term implementation chef-enhanced meal ) , 4 month post-implementation ( long-term implementation behavioral psychology ) and/or 7 month post-implementation ( long-term implementation chef-enhanced meal ) . Primary Aim 1 : examine impact introduce healthy , chef-enhanced food increase palatability selection consumption among elementary middle school student . It hypothesize increase selection consumption entree , fruit , vegetable school healthy , chef-enhanced food serve . Aim 2 : examine impact physical modification placement display food cafeteria selection/consumption among elementary middle school student . It hypothesize increase selection consumption entree , milk , fruit , vegetable modification make .
DOC.criteria: Students grade 18 attend participate school receive school meal study day Bringing lunch home study day eat lunch cafeteria study day
